task.title: Program Types
task.shortdesc: Program Types (Certification, Accreditation, Education, et al.) are used to segment programs based on the organizationâ€™s mission and business needs. An authenticated particiapant can access an active (unhidden) Program Profile using a provided URL based on the program's Program Type (or Parent Program Type).

step.cmd: Choose Programs application from the AppPicker
Populate Program Profile Page Title field. When the program type is including in the Program URL, the title displays at the top of the Program Profile Page.
Enter Display Order (number). This value determines the hierarchy of the program types as they are displayed on the Program Profile Page.
Parent Program Typelooks up to an existing Program Type. It allows the organization to manage and support multiple the program participant's online experience.
